unnormalised: Arre bhai, Dadar-antli ti sabzi mandi? Mol bhav kelo zalear tomat ₹20/kg-ak mellttat, na zalear te Rs. 35 sangtat! Ani tujhe poixe check karunk visrunakai; te vikte tim kedna kedna ₹10-kantlean kammi partti ditat.
normalised: Arre bhai, dadarachi ti sabzi mandi asa? Bargain kelear tomat ek kilo visar rupyak melltat, na zalear paintis rupya sangtat! Ani tumcho change check korunk visronaka; te dukandar kedna kedna dha rupyakompai ditat.
